category.name: Global Event
category.description: Commands to help stage a mass-player global event for logging

commands.name: create
commands.description: Creates a new global event

optional.name: combat
optional.description: Indicates whether this is a combat global or RP global. Default is RP/false

optional.name: mod
optional.description: Base RP modifier for the event. Default is 'medium'

commands.name: update
commands.description: Update base information on the global event

optional.name: name
optional.description: Global event name

optional.name: gold
optional.description: Base gold reward for the event

optional.name: experience
optional.description: Base experience reward for the event

optional.name: mod
optional.description: Base effort modifier for the event

optional.name: combat
optional.description: Indicates whether this is a combat global or RP global

commands.name: purge
commands.description: Purges all the currently stages global information without logging it

commands.name: scrape
commands.description: Scrapes a channel and adds all the non-bot users to the currently stages global event

commands.name: player_update
commands.description: Updates player information for the currently staged event, or if they are not in the event, will add/reactivate them.

optional.name: mod
optional.description: Players current effort modifier for the event

optional.name: host
optional.description: Players host status for the event

optional.name: gold
optional.description: Player's reward gold amount. If set, then will turn off auto-reward calculations for the player. To turn back on, re-run the command with the player's effort modifier specified

optional.name: exp
optional.description: Player's reward experience amount. If set, then will turn off auto-reward calculations for the player. To turn back on, re-run the command with the player's effort modifier specified

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes a player from the global event staging

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review the details of the currently staged global event

optional.name: player_list
optional.description: List out all the players and their information. Default is False

commands.name: mass_adjust
commands.description: Given a threshold and operator, adjust all players meeting the criteria to the designated effort modifier.

commands.name: commit
commands.description: Create and log the Global Event as it is currently staged. Will generate appropriate logs for each player

commands.name: help
commands.description: Summary and help information for the command group

category.name: Guild
category.description: Commands specific to Guild/server settings and configurations.

commands.name: max_level
commands.description: Set the max level for the server. Default is 3

commands.name: set_xp
commands.description: Override the XP for the server

commands.name: status
commands.description: Gets the current server's settings/status

optional.name: display_inactive
optional.description: List out the inactive players (defined as not having a log in the past 30 days

commands.name: stipend_add
commands.description: Adds/modifies a stipend for a role at a ratio of the level cap

optional.name: reason
optional.description: Reason for the stipend. Will be documented in the log notes.

commands.name: stipend_remove
commands.description: Removes a stipend for a given role

commands.name: schedule_reset
commands.description: Schedules what day/hour the weekly reset command will automatically run. Hour will be treated as UTC

commands.name: weekly_reset
commands.description: Performs a manually weekly reset for the server

commands.name: lookup
commands.description: Looks up information for a given item

commands.name: get_history
commands.description: Returns the log history for a player

optional.name: num_logs
optional.description: The number of logs to display. Minimum of 1, maximum of 20, default is 5

commands.name: rp
commands.description: Logs a completed RP for a player

commands.name: buy
commands.description: Log the purchase of an item for a player, subtracting the gold from their inventory

commands.name: sell
commands.description: Log the sell of an item for a player, adding the gold to their inventory.

commands.name: bonus
commands.description: Gives bonus gold and/or experience to a  player. Seek council approval for bonuses exceeding 25 xp/gp.

optional.name: gold
optional.description: Amount of gold to give to a player

optional.name: xp
optional.description: Amount of experience to give to a player

commands.name: ep
commands.description: Grant adventure rewards to the players and DMs of a given Adventure Role. NOTE: You must be an Admin/Council to run this command

commands.name: global
commands.description: Manually logs a global event for a player

commands.name: null
commands.description: Nullifies a log, and reverses all gold/xp rewards. NOTE: You must be an Admin/Council to run this command
